ACT
230
Special decision on the record
If the heirs do not contest the record, the court may, even before passing the decision on inheritance, at the request of the notary , pass a special decision on the record.
In that case, the provisions on entries in the land register and on the handing over of movable property that are kept by the court, a public notary or by their order to a third party will be applied accordingly.
